name: Aleph Solutions (Alephee)
headline: We help automotive aftermarket brands to supply and sell parts online
description:
Aleph helps companies with thousands of products like General Motors and Bosch increase their revenue in Latin America by listing their inventory on large e-commerce sites like Mercado Libre and Amazon. Our customers sell over U$D 4M dollars’ worth of product every month using our software.

Many brands struggle with the shift to sell on marketplaces. They want resellers to be involved in their online sales strategies, but both still need to maintain 10,000 products, prices and inventory up-to-date across digital channels and Marketplaces do not provide tools to help brands and resellers on the journey.

Aleph is the best way for brands and wholesalers to replicate their offline network of resellers online. With Aleph, Brands create high-quality product catalogs to share with their resellers. Now, any seller can access their product catalogue and sell on marketplaces.

founders.name: Gaston Zelerteins, Founder
founders.description:
Gaston is a technology entrepreneur.
In 2005 co-founded Perception Group, a Microsoft Gold Partner to develop software solutions across LATAM.
Now, he is building Aleph in partnership with Mercado Libre and Amazon, in charge of the commercial strategy, new businesses and the future of the company.
Gaston is married with Gabriela, is a proud father of three girls: Nina, Amelie and Ambar; and is always dreaming of changing the world making software to contribute to the evolution of societies.

founders.name: Javier Neumann, Founder
founders.description:
Javier is an Electronic engineer graduated w/honors at Buenos Aires University and an MBA at Saint Andrews University in Argentina.
Before founding Aleph, led the Microsoft Dynamics Division for Latin America and earlier was a regional sr executive at Accenture.
He is married w/Carolina and has 3 children (Agustina, Candela and Santiago). Loves sports and currently practices biking, swimming and golf.
At Aleph Javier leads strategic and finance planning and manages investors relationship.

founders.name: Jonathan Saiegh, Founder
founders.description:
Founder - COO & CPO at AlephCRM E-commerce & Software Lover
Information systems engineer with over 20 years experience in the software industry and e-commerce. Corporate market interacting with technologies areas and directors.
My main areas of expertise are: entrepreneurships, e-commerce, technologies business evaluation, projects investment, management, consulting for business technology strategies, product development, software engineering, sales specialist.

# We’re the ultimate platform to boost your business value and revolutionize the automotive ecosystem.
By digitally connecting brands, manufacturers, wholesalers, retailers, and service providers, we position ourselves as the only end-to-end interconnected platform to support your evolution.
Get free accountWatch demo (2 min)
No card required
Quick setup
![](https://alephv2imgstorage.blob.core.windows.net/website/images/cards.svg)
How do we do it?
## Innovation for Business Growth. 
For brands & manufacturers, we ensure a comprehensive view of the value chain through detailed metrics, streamline goal-setting and customized reports for a 360-degree visibility. 
Learn More.
For Wholesalers, our platform combines a business social network and B2B store for efficient product sourcing. With integrated carts, secure payments, and seamless shipping. 
Learn More.
For Retailers & Service Providers, connect with new distributors, expand product offerings across brands, ensure stock availability, and integrate into a global brand network for success. 
Learn More.
## Be a part of the 300+ companies that place their trust in us.

# Empowering your journey with exceptional support.
Our customer success team takes center stage, delivering personalized attention to brands, manufacturers and wholesalers. We offer continuous guidance and prompt responses, ensuring the success of every client. If you are a brand or distributor seeking more information, click below.
Talk to sales
## One free account, all the solutions you need.
Alephee offers a comprehensive platform designed to address diverse market needs. From advanced analytics and strategic planning to seamless communication platforms. Explore the array of solutions Alephee provides to elevate your business and navigate the evolving landscape with confidence.
B2B Supply Solutions
Manage your supply chain effectively with Alephee’s solutions, ensuring a streamlined and reliable flow of goods and materials.
Digital Sales Enhancement
Boost digital sales with enhanced dashboard intelligence. Empower retailers to sell more by leveraging our platform's insights.
## Global Scale: We are the driving force behind this industry.
Brands
300
Retailers

Catalogs

Listings
9M
Talk to salesGet free account
## Our strategic partners.
![](https://alephv2imgstorage.blob.core.windows.net/website/images/MercadoLibre.svg)![](https://alephv2imgstorage.blob.core.windows.net/website/images/amazon.svg)![](https://alephv2imgstorage.blob.core.windows.net/website/images/shopee.svg)
## FAQ.
What is Alephee?
We are a platform that allows you to develop your business strategy from end to end. We connect brands, manufacturers, distributors, the retail network, and service providers of the automotive industry.
In which countries does Alephee operate?
We have operations in Latin America: Brazil, Mexico, Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Peru, Ecuador and Uruguay.
What are the benefits of contracting Alephee?
Being part of the Alephee community allows brands, manufacturers, wholesale distributors and the retail network to streamline and optimize all their online sourcing and sales processes, connect organically to strengthen commercial relationships and triple the regional reach of products, grow +30% per year, generate 60% more new opportunities.
Which industries does Alephee work with?
Alephee works with brands, wholesale distributors and the retail network of the automotive industry with special focus on the aftermarket sector: auto parts, tires, motorcycle parts, truck and heavy-duty auto parts.
How to contract Alephee?
If you belong to a brand, manufacturer, or wholesale distributor, please contact our team of consultants directly. You can click on the following link. If you work in a dealership, spare parts store, or mechanic workshop, access our freemiun plan by clicking here.
What is the license fee?
To know the value of our exclusive licenses for dealerships, spare parts stores, or repair shops, visit our plans page by clicking here. If you belong to a brand, factory, or wholesale distributor, contact our team of consultants by clicking here and learn more about our values.
Which are Alephee's payment methods?
If you are in Brazil, you can pay by bank transfer. If you are in Argentina, you can pay by automatic debit, bank transfer or electronic check. From any other Latin American country, you can pay by bank transfer or Paypal.
Which e-commerce platforms can I integrate with if I contract Alephee?
Through Alephee you will be able to automate your sales processes in Mercado Libre, Amazon and Shopee, as available in your country.
Does Alephee provide technical support?
Yes, we offer different levels of technical support, we also have a help center through which you can access online training, guides, tutorials, and other content that will facilitate your day to day.
What other services does Alephee offer?
In Alephee we develop different services focused on helping you meet your goals and objectives in the short, medium and long term. In addition, we have services that can help you in the operation of your business from start to finish. Browse our platform to discover the services that best suit your needs.

generated_description:
**Aleph Solutions (Alephee): An Overview**

Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, Aleph Solutions—often called Alephee—is a Buenos Aires-based platform dedicated to revolutionizing the automotive aftermarket. Its mission? To help automotive brands sell parts effectively online. 

Initially designed to assist major companies like General Motors and Bosch, Alephee has carved a niche by significantly boosting revenue for these brands across Latin America. They achieve this by listing extensive product inventories on popular marketplaces such as Mercado Libre and Amazon. Remarkably, their software supports sales surpassing $4 million monthly for their customers.

**The Challenge and Solution**

As the marketplace world evolves, many brands struggle to adapt. A crucial hurdle is the need to manage thousands of products across various digital channels while also engaging resellers. Alephee recognizes this gap and offers a compelling solution. The platform enables brands to create high-quality product catalogs that resellers can access easily, essentially replicating their offline sales networks online.

Alephee isn’t just another software; it empowers brands, wholesalers, and retailers to navigate the complexities of online sales—and do so efficiently. With a team of 35 dedicated employees, Alephee connects all players in the automotive ecosystem—creating a seamless environment to thrive.

**What Alephee Offers**

- **B2B Social Network:** By fostering organic connections among manufacturers, wholesalers, and retailers, Alephee creates a vibrant community. It’s more than transactions; it’s about building partnerships.

- **Advanced Platforms for Growth:** Alephee streamlines goal-setting with comprehensive metrics, enabling businesses to have a clear view of their performance. Their platform integrates secure payments, shipping solutions, and business social networking all in one place.

- **Impactful Results:** Alephee reports impressive growth metrics, including the potential for small businesses to see an 80% increase in sales during their first year of partnership.

- **Global Reach:** While rooted in Latin America—operating in countries such as Brazil, Mexico, and Argentina—Alephee aims to scale and expand further in the automotive aftermarket sector.

- **Support and Solutions:** Beyond just a platform, Alephee prides itself on exceptional customer support, ensuring each client receives the guidance they need to succeed.

In short, Alephee is reimagining how the automotive aftermarket interacts with the digital marketplace. If you’re a brand or a wholesaler looking to enhance your online presence and bolster sales, Aleph Solutions is worth a look. For more information, check out their [website](https://www.alephee.com).
